content_text:
TYPE: email
SOURCE: data\eml\Temporary Access Change – NLND Neuland Building.eml

SUBJECT: Temporary Access Change – NLND Neuland Building
DATE: Wed, 21 Jan 2026 03:51:48 +0000
FROM: "Reyes Aleman, Cristhian (SRH Hochschule Berlin Student)" <Cristhian.ReyesAleman@stud.srh-campus-berlin.de>
TO: "Sarkhel, Swapnaneel (SRH Hochschule Berlin Student)" <Swapnaneel.Sarkhel@stud.srh-campus-berlin.de>

BODY:
From: campus-management@srh.berlin
To: students@srh.berlin
Subject: Temporary Access Change – NLND Neuland Building

Dear students,

Please note that due to maintenance work, access to the NLND Neuland building
will be restricted on Monday, 26th January 2026.

On this day, the main entrance will be closed after 14:00.
Students must use the side entrance near the SHED building.

This information is not published on the website.

Kind regards,
SRH Berlin Campus Management
